description:
The Greek myDATA v1.0.7 provided by AADE, in a single dll. Get the full control and support of myDATA. It offers a number of simple tools that making creating apps that support myDATA simple and quick.
	We developed a single dll file to assist you in implementing myDATA REST API Invoicing System into your application!
	
	Since November 1, 2021, all Greek companies must use myDATA REST API and send their invoices to them in real time.
	Using this DLL, you can handle all of these invoices, send them to myDATA, and provide reports to the end user.
	myDATA DLL contains a variety of tools for sending, retrieving, and managing invoices from and to the myDATA invoicing system.
releaseNotes:
Version 4.1.0
With version 4.1.0.0, we introduce new library features that allow developers to turn their ERP applications into Invoicing Provider applications.
Then, you are ready to proceed with the procedures for your certification as an invoicing provider by AADE.
	1. Class SendInvoices: An optional Boolean parameter for sending invoices to the provider platform has been added.
	2. Class myDATATools: The getInvoiceTypeProvider method has been added. It returns all invoice types that invoicing providers can interact with.
	3. The new class 'RequestInvoicesProvider' has been added. With this class, the invoicing provider can retrieve invoices sent by the entity through an invoicing provider.
	4. The new class 'RequestReceiverInfoProvider' has been added. With this class, the invoicing provider can retrieve the invoicing providers of a VAT number, as well as the emails in which this VAT number accepts electronic invoices issued from invoicing providers.
	
	Documentation:
	1. The section 'How to Become an Invoicing Provider' that contains instructions on how to customise your applications to become an Invoicing Provider has been included.
	2. A special section 'What an Invoicing Provider means', which you should read carefully before deciding to become an invoicing provider has been included.
	3. The section 'Code Samples' was renamed 'ERP Code Samples'.
	4. Code Samples for Invoicing Providers has been added.
	
	Change of Terms of Use
	In the terms of use, after paragraph 11, the paragraph 'USE OF THE LIBRARY BY INVOICING PROVIDERS' was added with the number 12. The number of subsequent paragraphs was increased by one (1).
